page.title: 03GRAND UNION CANAL
page.content: Over 2 million people nationwide use the Grand Union Canal for recreational purposes such as fishing,jogging, walking and in some place canoeing. The trouble with fishing is all the tackle obstructs walkers and joggers on the narrow towpath although it is used as an everyday pedestrian highway.Pleasure cruising has increased in the last 10 years.The activity seems to favour the summer months while in winter it is relatively quiet you can hire a boat for leisure orr to take you from one place to another.The nearest place to hire a boat is at the Packet Boat Basin,Cowley. However the canal is used for employment purposes such as carrying cargo,scrap metals and farm products.
